title: FPS Drops
body:
My fps runs at 60 sometimes but regularly drops down to 15-20 fps and sometimes 10 during team fights. This is my specs:

Operating System: Windows 8.1 64-bit (6.3, Build 9600) (9600.winblue_ltsb.160328-1315)
           Language: English (Regional Setting: English)
System Manufacturer: TOSHIBA
       System Model: Satellite S50t-B
               BIOS: 1.40
          Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4500U CPU @ 1.80GHz (4 CPUs), ~2.4GHz
             Memory: 8192MB RAM
Available OS Memory: 8112MB RAM

Is my processor too slow?

replies.body: Your processor definitely meets minimum specs, but in most cases FPS issues are a GPU thing rather than a CPU thing.  I'd go ahead and follow the steps in our [Low FPS Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684) article which has steps to increase maximize performance. Let me know if it helps!
OK thank you very much, i'll run give the article another run later this week. And i'll inform you of the results
